code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import oceanVideo from'../img/openoceanfinal.mp4';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Homepage(){const[hoveredHello,setHoveredHello]=useState(false);const[hoveredIm,setHoveredIm]=useState(false);const[hoveredRui,setHoveredRui]=useState(false);const handleHoverHello=()=>{setHoveredHello(!hoveredHello);};const handleHoverIm=()=>{setHoveredIm(!hoveredIm);};const handleHoverRui=()=>{setHoveredRui(!hoveredRui);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"homepage-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"video-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("video",{muted:true,autoPlay:true,loop:true,className:"video-background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("source",{src:oceanVideo,type:"video/mp4"})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"homepage-text-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/about",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{onMouseEnter:handleHoverHello,onMouseLeave:handleHoverHello,children:hoveredHello?'About':'Hello.'})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/projects",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{onMouseEnter:handleHoverIm,onMouseLeave:handleHoverIm,children:hoveredIm?'Projects':"I'm"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/contacts",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{onMouseEnter:handleHoverRui,onMouseLeave:handleHoverRui,children:hoveredRui?'Contact me':'Rui Melo'})})]})]});}export default Homepage;
